definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: rub, scrape (NH id., rub ears of wheat, scrape);—only

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pt. [[מוֹלֵל]] in [[קׂרֵץ בְּעֵינׇו֠ מוֹלֵל בְּרַגְלָָו֠ מׂרֶה בְּאֶחְבְּעׂתָיו]] Pr 6:13 he that winketh with his eyes, that scrapeth with his feet (making signs), etc., so De Now Str < Ew Wild fr. I. [[מלל]] that speaketh with his feet.
